metadata.name: PowerShell Get-Process LSASS in ScriptBlock
metadata.comment: Detects a Get-Process command on lsass process, which is in almost all cases a sign of malicious activity

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-process lsass')))

output.summary: Detects a Get-Process command on lsass process, which is in almost all cases a sign of malicious activity

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate certificate exports invoked by administrators or users (depends on processes in the environment - filter if unusable) Reference: https://web.archive.org/web/20220205033028/https://twitter.com/PythonResponder/status/1385064506049630211
